bibl.title: with contributions by J.N. BIRDSALL, Supplement I to J.K. Elliott, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Mauscripts. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The first of an occasional series to update: J. Keith ELLIOTT, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Manuscripts. 2nd Edition = Society for New Testament Studies. Monograph Series. 109 (Cambridge, 2000).
ELLIOTT J.K., with contributions by J.N. BIRDSALL, Supplement I to J.K. Elliott, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Mauscripts. Avec résumé en anglais.
